snake.main.objects

Class Snake

  • java.lang.Object
    • snake.main.objects.Snake

  • public class Snake
extends java.lang.Object
    The Snake class represents a relevant game object and is used for painting
    Since:
    2017-04-26
    Version:
    1.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int direction
      Direction of a Snake with initial value.
      boolean isEating
      Triggers when the Snake eats.
      java.util.List<Point> snakeList
      List of Point which form up the Snake.
